entry.title: WIND WARNING , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 9:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 along parts of the coast in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
